name: fleishig
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in the Jewish religion) made of, containing, or used for meat, and therefore to be kept separate from milk products: Fleishig (meat) and milchig (dairy) dishes should not be prepared or eaten together. My mother never bothered to distinguish between milchik and fleishik. Compare
kosher
More examplesFewer examplesThe use of olive oil instead of fleishig animal fat is common.We have separate pots, dishes, and utensils for preparing, serving and eating fleishig dishes.He cut the onions with the fleishig knife. These pans are my fleishig set.
